verbs.description: [ARG0: assemblyman william scarborough] [V: gets] [ARG1: prison sentence for cheating taxpayers] the queens democrat was sentenced monday to a year and a month in federal prison for theft of government funds and wire fraud committed between 2009 and 2012 scarborough 69 will report to a u s bureau of prisons location nov 10 joining an ever - increasing list of new york lawmakers serving time behind bars for state and federal corruption the sad part about the whole situation is that the people william scarborough tommy mcavoy prison
